title: Snowdown shop hiccup
body:
Hello, recently when I opened my snowdown shop I noticed I could buy soulhunter kayn for 975rp. Coincidently the shop also had the same skin for sale at the same price.

I was just wondering whether there could.be anyway you guys replace the soulhunter kayn in my snowdown shop with another skin as I'm gonna buy the kayn skin I'm the shop. I just don't want to waste a space on my shop is all.

Thank you!

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support, if he's in your snowdown shop he should be discounted, they should be able to help you with that.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
